source.512cfbb1:
exp_vals=[Comedy,Ent,Mus]
labels=['Comedy','entertainment','Music']
plt.axis('equal')
explode=(0,0.5,0.5)
colors=['Pink','Red','Orange']
plt.pie(exp_vals,radius=2,autopct='%0.1f%%',shadow=True,explode=explode,startangle=45,labels=labels,colors=colors)
plt.show()
